title: 2D Transformation
doc: transformation of the local origin of the entity relative to its parent

attributes.name: translation
attributes.doc: position relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: rotation
attributes.doc: rotation in degrees relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: scale
attributes.doc: scale relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: skew
attributes.doc: 2D skew transformation along the X- and the Y-axis

attributes.name: localMatrix
attributes.doc: 3x3 matrix that transforms from local to parent entity coordinate space

attributes.name: worldTranslation
attributes.doc: position relative to the world's origin

attributes.name: worldMatrix
attributes.doc: 3x3 matrix that transforms from local to world coordinate space
